attributes.action: 10,000 to sign to make public travel free for under 18's
attributes.additional_details: 10000 people to sign to make public transport free for under 18's

rejection.details: Several petitions have been put down over the past few months, calling for free travel for those under 18 years of age.  Incidentally, if the aim of this petition is to get a debate in the House of Commons, the petitioner will want to note that the threshold is ten times larger than the 10,000 it calls for.
